tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The Doctor is 90% bengali  and 10% bihari.  He loves music. Especially  Rabindra Sangeet and possesses a fairly good  collection. We are from the same fraternity ie  M/Defence. Both of us are retired One of the striking features of his personality is his interest for 'ADDA' (gossip) . Even when he is discharging his professional duty deftly, he doesn't forget to appreciate the finer nuances of a song which makes him a lovely person, someone you can rely upon. The inherent quality of not deviating from 'ADDA' [metaphorically] while disciplining the unruly tooth(eeth) makes him a very adorable friendly gentleman Doctor. May God shower him with good health and happy peaceful life.
reply_text: Thanx Madam for your kind wishes üôè

review: Nice experience  definitely recommend to friends.doctor is very very good and experienced.and very kind person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Apart from Dr. Jha being very professional and frindly, Felix Dental clinic is very clean hygienically. Dr. Saroj himself is extremely caring. He invariably responds to phone calls. Yesterday my wife accompanied me to Felix clinic for her own dental sensitivity. She was pleased to receive warm welcome from Dr. Saroj. What surprised us both was Dr. Saroj did not charge her any fees including the mandatory consultation fee. Needless to say I am very satisfied with my dental implant treatment by Dr. Saroj Ojha.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came from the United States to recieve 4 implants. It was a scary proposition but Dr. Ojha and his colleagues were wonderful. The work is of the highest quality, everything happened as I was told it would, and the price was very reasonable. I could tell the whole time that it was important to the doctor that my work would be completed successfully and that my satisfaction with the experience was important to him. I highly recommend Feliz Dental to anyone, local or international. Thank you. I love my teeth!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
After visiting 3 dentists i was lucky to land up at doc sk ojha's clinic. My wisdom tooth was hooked at the bottom thus it was supposedly a tough one as explained by other dentists. But ojha sir did it with ease and it was a painless process for me.  I didnt feel any pain after 1 day of surgery which involved stiches( generaly after stiches people expirience pain for 3 days)

Moreover he is friendly, caring and down to earth kind of a doctor which is quite rare these days.
I would recommend him to everyone, even those not living in dwarka..because for me 16km drive was worth it

tags: None
review:
Dr. Col. Saroj kumar ojha is very very friendly n expertise in his field of experience. I visit clinic for RCT of one of my tooth but he only suggest me not to go for RCT as my tooth found healthy and fine after few examination. Otherwise In sake of earning money, he could do RCT of my tooth (which will cost me around 4-5k per tooth) but he doesn't.  So instead pf RCT he suggests me to go for some kind of ceramic filling treatment ( cost me total 2100) which is really painless. After this treatment.. When he told me to have a look at my teeth..then I was unable to fine the crack in my tooth. Really its gone.. N I got my original like healthy teeth back.
Thank you Dr. For you kind n money saving advice.

tags: None
review:
This doctor is full concerned about patient pocket money, because when I visited in his clinic in dwarka with no pain in my teeth. After his diagnosis he said we ll test ur teeth with particular chemical fr 5 days and I believed him so said yes . Then he filled my teeth wt bad painful chemical and I started crying infrnt of him than he said I removed it and u just go for root canal .Please suggest me how any dental doctor without xray of particular teeth .how he proceed for that. 
My dear all dental  patients please don't go this doctor clinic. He just concerned about how he can loose ur pocket with wrong diagnose. 
When I come back from his clinic with full of pain in my all teeth .

tags: None
review:
I was lucky enough to be recommended to Dr Ojha for my teeth extraction. His expertise in his field is evident from the way he treats and explains the problems to the patients. 2 of my wisdom teeth had to be extracted out of which one was embedded inside the gum. The other doctors I had gone to for consultation had scared me within minutes of showing me my scans, but Dr Ojha was very comforting and confident about the whole situation. He guaranteed that the extraction would be painless, and indeed it was. We were pretty much laughing for most of the surgery time. The other people in my family who had had similar procedures done had warned me of post-op pains from stitches but I had had none of it even after 2-3 days of the surgery .There was no grogginess either . I was playing with my neice the moment I came back from the procedure! 

I would recommend him to anyone who even mentions 'teeth' to me because of the brilliant experience that I had. 
Kudos to him! :D

tags: None
context: Conservative Dentistry,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
Being new in Dwarka finding a dentist was not easy.Until my sixties I had not had much experience with dentists.The only good one I knew worked too far away.Dr.Ojha was recommended by a dentist family friend.I was reassured by Dr.Ojha's own credentials.He was a gold medallist and had worked for many years in the army.
I have been going to him for more then two years.As a person who often has breathing problems abd chronic cold ,I find  that he is very capable and deft.
I also feel that his fee too is reasonable.
I wish him luck because he is a very good dentist.His clinic is not a shop .Dr Ojha is a professional ,and though young enough, has that old fashioned reassurance that is rare nowadays.
